Writing a function!

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  if(!is.numeric(x)){
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  }else if (length(x) == 1){
    stop("Z score cannot be computed for length 1 vectors")
  }
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
}

z_scores(x_vec)
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
z_scores(x = 3)

z_scores("my name is ixta")

z_scores(iris)

z_scores(sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), 25, replace = TRUE))

```
